title: New: Big Baby Gandhi – NO1 2 LOOK UP 2
body:
**[Big Baby Gandhi](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/14642-new-big-baby-gandhi-hi-its-me-baby-prod-hot-sugar/ "New: Big Baby Gandhi – Hi It’s Me, Baby (Prod. Hot Sugar)")** is an artist who’s been getting a decent amount of coverage here at Cit. I expected his newly announced Mixtape, **_NO1 2 Look Up 2_**, to be impressive, what I wasn’t expecting was the record be quite possibly my favourite record of the year so far. Articulate, witty, socially conscious, funny, emotionally engrossing and dramatically demanding; the LP sounds like a slice of Queens that most aren’t likely to know exists. It’s also fantastically produced, with spots from **[Hot Sugar](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12065-new-hot-sugar-da-paperboy/ "New: Hot Sugar – Da Paperboy")** and Gandhi himself; with beats this fresh it’s easy to imagine **BBG** receiving attention from areas beyond the blogosphere.

Download the record **[HERE.](http://www.mediafire.com/?kisk9msr1381za8)**
